Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Namesake \Name"sake`\, n. [For name's sake; i. e., one named for the sake of another's name.] One that has the same name as another; especially, one called after, or named out of regard to, another. [1913 Webster]
namesake n : a person with the same name as another
